Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Plot: When an unassuming high school chemistry teacher discovers he has a rare form of lung cancer, he decides to team up with a former student and create a top of the line crystal meth in a used RV, to provide for his family once he is gone.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Aaron Hill, Gregory Chase, John Koyama, Max Arciniega Jr.

Episodes.Title: Cat's in the Bag...
Episodes.Plot: Walt and Jesse attempt to tie up loose ends. The desperate situation gets more complicated with the flip of a coin. Walt's wife, Skyler, becomes suspicious of Walt's strange behavior.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: ...And the Bag's in the River
Episodes.Plot: Walter fights with Jesse over his drug use, causing him to leave Walter alone with their captive, Krazy-8. Meanwhile, Hank has a scared straight moment with Walter Jr. after his aunt discovers he has been smoking pot. Also, Skylar is upset when Walter stays away from home.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Cancer Man
Episodes.Plot: Walter finally tells his family that he has been stricken with cancer. Meanwhile, the DEA believes Albuquerque has a new, big time player to worry about. Meanwhile, a worthy recipient is the target of a depressed Walter's anger, and Jesse makes a surprise visit to his parents home.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: Tess Harper, Michael Bofshever, Kyle Bornheimer, Steven Michael Quezada

Episodes.Title: Gray Matter
Episodes.Plot: Walter and Skyler attend a former colleague's party. Jesse tries to free himself from the drugs, while Skyler organizes an intervention.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: William Sterchi, Marc Mouchet, Kiira Arai Sniegowski, William Allen, Loren Haynes, Kyle Swimmer, Robert Arrington, Frederic Doss, Juanita Trad

Episodes.Title: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
Episodes.Plot: The side effects of chemo begin to plague Walt. Meanwhile, the DEA rounds up suspected dealers.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: Pierre Barrera, Charles Baker, Jesus Payan, Cesar Garcia, Vivian Nesbitt, Judith Rane, Seraphine DeYoung, Dennis Keiffer

Episodes.Title: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
Episodes.Plot: Walter accepts his new identity as a drug dealer after a PTA meeting. Elsewhere, Jesse decides to put his aunt's house on the market and Skyler is the recipient of a baby shower.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Raymond Cruz, Cesar Garcia, Jesus Payan, Carmen Serano, Beth Bailey, Carrie Fleming
